biotools.summary: Known Antibody Search (KA-Search) is designed to facilitate the rapid and exhaustive search of antibody variable domains. It addresses a key challenge in immunology and biotechnology: the need to analyze and compare vast numbers of antibody sequences efficiently.

bioschemas.name: KA-Search
